pr_title: KAFKA-8164: Improve test passing rate by rerunning flaky tests

timeline.message: KAFKA-8164: Improve test passing rate by rerunning flaky tests

timeline.bodyText: I would go with something conservative: 1 retry and max 5 failures.We want to fix flaky tests, but if something just fails once, it's not worth failing the build given Jenkins flakiness.
timeline.author: ijuma

replies.bodyText: We can adjust after we see how it works in practice, but this would be a good starting point IMO.
replies.author: ijuma

replies.bodyText: Ok. I figured we can also make these configurable. Updated the PR.
replies.author: viktorsomogyi

timeline.bodyText: How about maxTestRetries and maxTestRetryFailures? Also, we need to update the Readme to mention these.
